summary:
Pursuing a career in risk and compliance and currently working at Heineken in the Netherlands. A diligent and conscientious bilingual (Russian and English), who is a highly versatile and experienced individual offering expertise in internal audit, risks and controls, and data analytics. 

Have demonstrated understanding of risk management, focus on continuous process improvements and an ability to analyse the data to gather insights into the processes. Possess deep technical knowledge combined with strong interpersonal skills and proven track-record of maintaining successful stakeholder relations. Have outstanding analytical, critical thinking, complex problem solving, customer service, communication, cognitive flexibility and leadership skills as well as the ability to learn and get the job done.

In addition, have a knowledge of accounting and audit fields including familiarity with national and international accounting standards (IFRS, US GAAP, RAP) gained through studies (ACCA and Hult IBS) as well as professional experience at KPMG. Experienced in implementing business models, developing business and marketing strategies through participation in consulting projects for multinational corporations (UBS, ABB Group) and startups (YapJobs) as well as participation in Case Competitions (SF Education & KFSA - finalist team, Unilever Future Leaders League). 

Please feel free to get in touch on LinkedIn or through email at anastasia_zelenskaya@hotmail.com

[{'title': 'Unilever Future Leaders League', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': "In a team of three performed an in-depth analysis of the targeted audience to double the revenue of Ekzo's business in Russia in the long term.

• Market research

• Business analysis and evaluation
• Research and analysis of regulations in regards to M&A in the USA
• Financial forecasts', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Anastasia', 'last_name': 'Zelenskaya', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Internal Control Specialist | Heineken'}]}, {'title': 'Hult Impact Challenge - UBS - Finalist Team', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': 'Developed a business model for Hult’s client company, Union Bank of Switzerland, to find a one-stop shop cross-divisional banking solution.

• Conducted industry analysis comparing 10 top banks based on quarterly ROI to gather data resulting in implementation of a strategy to differentiate UBS against its competitors.
• Worked with a team of five to design a system that is customized to the needs of the corporate and institutional clients.
• Improved the back office operations and provided faster and more secure transactions through the implementation of the blockchain concept in the banking sector.
• Reduced time period of client on boarding from 6 months to 2 months for the Know Your Customer (KYC) process.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Anastasia', 'last_name': 'Zelenskaya', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Internal Control Specialist | Heineken'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sara', 'last_name': 'Gulam', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Accountant at Neo Smart Blinds'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Andreea- Georgiana', 'last_name': 'Ziongkas', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior Manager- Strategic Solutions at GLG'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ikbol', 'last_name': 'Hakimov', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Trade Finance | CITF | LBS | Financial Institutions Group at the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD)'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Kito', 'last_name': 'Tabalujan, CAIA', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior Analyst at McKinsey & Company'}]}, {'title': 'ABB Challenge', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': 'Developed a marketing strategy for a new product of Hult’s client company, ABB Group.

• Analysed the top 50 companies within the motor industry to identify the most effective way to market a newly developed product.
• Conducted research on two multibillion-dollar perspective clients to improve the chances of closing a deal on the bulk purchase of the new product line.
• Proposed possible launching steps for the company’s product to increase effectiveness of the product when it goes to the market.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Anastasia', 'last_name': 'Zelenskaya', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Internal Control Specialist | Heineken'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sara', 'last_name': 'Gulam', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Accountant at Neo Smart Blinds'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sergio', 'last_name': 'Fiallo', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Saas | Lead Generation | Outbound | Prospecting | Bilingual'}]}, {'title': 'YapJobs Project for Hult Management Consulting Club', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': 'Conducted market research for the client, start-up company, of Hult Management Consulting Club.

• Measured effectiveness of the expansion for the client company by collecting and analysing the data of the technology market in Los Angeles.
• Developed marketing strategies to prevail the client company over its competitors.
• Predicted the initial investment to be paid back within three years due to the projected ROI of 1.8%.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Anastasia', 'last_name': 'Zelenskaya', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Internal Control Specialist | Heineken'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sara', 'last_name': 'Gulam', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Accountant at Neo Smart Blinds'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sabrina', 'last_name': 'Tatham Khanwalkar', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Project Manager at SVB'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Vitoria', 'last_name': 'Falleiros', 'name': None, 'headline': 'M&A at EY'}]}]

• Being involved in the entire project lifecycle, including scope definition, memo and RCM preparation, preliminary assessment, testing approach definition, fieldwork and reporting to ensure the timelines are met and the project is delivered within 10% of the budget.
• Conducting interviews with process owners/relevant stakeholders to gather process specific knowledge, assess risk level and controls in place and therefore provide audit assurance and help the management to mitigate existent and potential risks.
• Using data driven technology (DDT) and analytics to perform a full population testing and/or provide the client with valuable insights into their processes.
• Participated in the risk workshop organised to provide support in enhancing client’s risk register through understanding the business, evaluating existing risks and identifying relevant risk mitigation strategies.
• Developed a project approach playbook to have a written guideline on team audit practices to successfully onboard external consultants and reduce the time needed for them to get to know the way the team works.', 'title': 'Internal Auditor', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2525300, 'name': 'KPMG', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQFrqkKAlHCfyA/company-logo_400_400/0/1688581211794?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=lBtdhwZezygqq414F89zSnYvhC2lu5ksCELvLAwLAgE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/kpmg/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Moscow, Russian Federation', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'KPMG', 'description': 'Verified clients’ financial statements for the reliability of the data. Was in charge of SE engagements and assisting the person in charge of FSA engagements.

• Participated in coaching of junior staff members to achieve technical competencies and efficient performance.
• Obtained appropriate audit evidence and addressing relevant audit objectives to perform substantive testing.
• Documented the results of the audit work performed in accordance with KPMG Audit Methodology and regulatory requirements.
• Liaised with the clients to obtain a thorough understanding of the internal processes and controls of the company, test the effectiveness of the controls and identify the risk of material misstatement.', 'title': 'Audit Assistant', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Moscow, Russian Federation', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'KPMG', 'description': 'Undertook audit-related tasks in a team-based working environment.

• Assisted in carrying out quality audit and other assurance services to clients to provide an independent, objective assessment of financial statements and to check the compliance with international and national standards (IFRS, RAP, US GAAP).
• Supported in performing tests of existing processes and controls to ensure that resources are allocated and managed effectively and the provided financial information is accurate.
• Interacted with clients to assure the information flow from the client to the audit team is efficient.
• Attended stock counts to confirm that the book records and actual physical count of inventory match.', 'title': 'Intern in the Audit Department, Energy and Natural Resources Group', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Parvez & Co.
